title: Michael Steinberg (filmmaker)
text: Michael Steinberg (born 15 May 1959) is a director, writer and producer. He is a graduate of the <a href="UCLA%20School%20of%20Theater%2C%20Film%20and%20Television">UCLA School of Theater, Film and Television</a>. He has directed three films that all premiered at the <a href="Sundance%20Film%20Festival">Sundance Film Festival</a> and has written and/or produced four other award-winning features since his debut in 1992. In addition, Steinberg has written, directed, and/or produced several television projects since 2000.
